xwikidoc.name: ClassItemSheet
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.bbarrett
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.bbarrett
xwikidoc.content:
## you can modify this page to customize the presentation of your object ## at first you should keep the default presentation ## save this template using the save button at the top left 1 Document $doc.name ## Change class name to your class name #set($class = $doc.getObject("XWiki.MyClass").xWikiClass) #foreach($prop in $class.properties) #end
*${prop.prettyName}* $doc.display($prop.getName())
